mapper.select: select p.id, p.member_id, m.login_id, p.category, p.title, p.content, p.hit, p.created_date from post p join member m on p.member_id = m.id and p.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into post (member_id, category, title, content) values (#{memberId}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from post p join member m on p.member_id = m.id
and ${key} like concat('%', #{word}, '%')
